name: Spellsword
text:
You gain the Arcane Guard ability:
Cost: 0 AP.
You guard a location or ally you can see. Until your guard breaks, you gain +1 natural, elemental, and spiritual armor.
Restriction: You must be wearing level 1 or no armor to perform this action.
Restriction: You must be wielding only a one-handed dagger or sword to perform this action.
